entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
